title: HAP 71 - In Blyden’s Wake - West African Intellectuals of the Early Twentieth Century
itunes:title: HAP 71 - In Blyden’s Wake - West African Intellectuals of the Early Twentieth Century
description: West African intellectuals like J.E. Casely-Hayford and Mojola Agbebi build upon Edward Blyden’s ideas at the dawn of the twentieth century.
